resources.string: We want to create a centralized platform for Cal Poly SLO students to be educated on and aware of campus resources, and be referenced to safe community spaces. The inspiration for this project stems from the recent personal stories by Cal Poly students shared publicly highlighting the lack of discussions, support, and resources provided by the university. We have taken it upon ourselves as current students and alumni of Cal Poly to call for a change and empower those who want to voice their experience.

Suicide Hotline: 
+18002738355 

Bias Incident Response Team: 
https://birt.calpoly.edu/report 

Center for Health & Wellbeing: 
https://chwcalpoly.edu 

Covid Testing: 
https://emergencyslo.org/testing.aspx
